00027 template<class T>
00028 class Iterator : public Object {
00029 public:
00030 
00036     Iterator(const Iterable & it) {}
00037 
00041     virtual ~Iterator() {}
00048     virtual bool hasNext() const = 0;
00057     virtual const T & next() const = 0;
00064     virtual bool hasPrevious() const = 0;
00073     virtual const T & previous() const = 0;
00082     virtual std::size_t nextIndex() const = 0;
00091     virtual std::size_t previousIndex() const = 0;
00092 
00096     const T& operator++() const { return next(); }
00100     const T& operator--() const { return previous(); }
00101 };

00112 template<class T>
00113 class MutableIterator : public virtual Iterator<T> {
00114 public:
00115 
00121     MutableIterator(const Iterable & it) {}
00125     virtual ~Iterator() {}
00133     virtual void set(T & t) throw(Exception) = 0;
00134 
00141     virtual void insert(T & t) throw(Exception) = 0;
00147     virtual void remove() throw(Exception) = 0;
00148 };

00155     public:

00159     Sylph::Core::Iterator<T> i;
